author: Leslie Hansbarger
text: Loudoun County, VA is seeking information from other localities to see what policies are in place that address allowable expenses utilizing local tax funding.  This includes all County/city departments and elected officials. Please send responses to Janet Romanchyk, Controller with the Department of Management and Financial Services, Loudoun County, Va. email janet.romanchyk@loudoun.gov .”
title: Allowable Expenses Policy
